them, the best solution to meet the fourth and fifth requirements is implemented based on the Message Queuing Telemetry Transport (MQTT) protocol. The MQTT protocol is a client-server-based messaging and subscription transport protocol that provides reliable network services for devices in low bandwidth and unstable network environments. The MQTT protocol is open, simple, lightweight, and easy to use. It supports one-to-many messaging to decouple applications. It also ensures message reachability, which is very suitable for sending notifications to the mobile client.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"A","start":100,"end":135,"href":"https:\\u002F\\u002Fwww.alibabacloud.com\\u002Fproduct\\u002Fmq","anchorType":"LINK","userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_46":{"id":"6068d68874d8_46","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"d31e","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*1p7vZ-k1_GUKMALv.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_47":{"id":"6068d68874d8_47","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f2ec","text":"However, MQTT is just a protocol. Before applying the MQTT protocol to large-scale commercial scenarios, it needs support from mature and stable products. None of the MQTT solutions from the open-source community have gone through rigorous testing and commercialization. When the number of clients reaches 1,000, their performance sharply declines. Therefore, they cannot support tens of thousands of online clients at the same time.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_48":{"id":"6068d68874d8_48","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"df3c","text":"Focusing on interaction scenarios in online classes, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group has made in-depth exchanges with technical experts from Alibaba Cloud. After several rounds of testing and evaluation, the R&D Team finally decided to use Alibaba Cloudâ€™s micro-Message Queue (mMQ) for MQTT to build its interaction platform for online classes. Compared with open-source solutions, Alibaba Cloudâ€™s mMQ for MQTT has been tested and evolved within Alibaba Group. It supports tens of millions of online connections, millions of concurrent messages, and notification sending at the millisecond level. It is designed with a distributed architecture. With no Single Point of Failure (SPOF) and infinite horizontal scalability between components, it ensures the elastic scalability of capacity and transparency to users.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"A","start":390,"end":418,"href":"https:\\u002F\\u002Fwww.alibabacloud.com\\u002Fproduct\\u002Fmq","anchorType":"LINK","userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_49":{"id":"6068d68874d8_49","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"dec1","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*-77nONjxY7HCbU6O.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_50":{"id":"6068d68874d8_50","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f25f","text":"In this architecture, clients on the Internet access Alibaba Cloudâ€™s mMQ for MQTT through the standard MQTT protocol. The SDK of the MQTT protocol covers almost all mainstream development languages and can be adapted to the unstable network of the mobile client. Server cluster on the cloud accesses Message Queue (MQ) for RocketMQ through the RocketMQ protocol and realizes two-way interconnections between servers and clients through protocol conversion between RocketMQ and MQTT.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"A","start":53,"end":81,"href":"https:\\u002F\\u002Fwww.alibabacloud.com\\u002Fproduct\\u002Fmq","anchorType":"LINK","userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_51":{"id":"6068d68874d8_51","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4665","text":"Why was a new component, MQ for RocketMQ, introduced? Why are server instances accessed to MQ for RocketMQ through RocketMQ protocol? There are three main reasons:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_52":{"id":"6068d68874d8_52","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"2adc","text":"1. Compared with client instances, server instances are smaller in scale, while the message throughput of a single server instance is larger than that of the client.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":165,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_53":{"id":"6068d68874d8_53","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"86b1","text":"In a typical online class scenario, tens of thousands (or hundreds of thousands) of clients are connected to the server at the same time. Each client should send and receive no more than ten messages per second. However, each server instance may process tens of thousands of messages per second in a cluster with 100 instances. The difference between the server and the client determines that they need to use different communication protocols for access to maximize their performance and efficiency.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_54":{"id":"6068d68874d8_54","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"364a","text":"2. When the processing capability of the server is insufficient, messages need to be temporarily stored in the queue.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":117,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_55":{"id":"6068d68874d8_55","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f652","text":"The introduction of RocketMQ provides message storage for MQTT.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_56":{"id":"6068d68874d8_56","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"5a7c","text":"3. Multiple instances of the server cluster imply peer-to-peer and task-allocation relationships. The RocketMQ-based cluster consumption mode can provide the native load balancing mechanism.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":190,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_57":{"id":"6068d68874d8_57","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4ae7","text":"Letâ€™s come back to the message sending scenario in online classes. After the message is submitted, an instance in the server cluster receives the message through the load balancing mechanism. After reviewing, the message can be distributed to other users in the same class by delivering it to the MQTT-based cloud service. Thus, for server instances, they only need to establish connections with the MQTT-based cloud service for serving tens of thousands of users at the same time.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_58":{"id":"6068d68874d8_58","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"718f","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*1iSQeYZdSkzMiQj9.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_59":{"id":"6068d68874d8_59","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4dd4","text":"When the server instance encounters a performance bottleneck during peak hours, this issue can be solved by adding more server instances. For MQTT-based cloud services, the performance improvement of it can be achieved by upgrading configurations according to rules, which has little influence on the operation of the application.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_60":{"id":"6068d68874d8_60","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"b07a","text":"Based on this architecture, the R&D Team of the Aixuexi Education Group built a complete class interaction system in half a month. The R&D Team does not need to focus on complex technical issues at the application layer, such as bad network environments, reconnection, exception handling, high concurrency, and high system availability. This architecture helps the team greatly reduce development costs and improve user experience.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_61":{"id":"6068d68874d8_61","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4b66","text":"To support the rapid increase of users brought by the â€œOn-Cloud Learningâ€ program, Aixuexi Education Group has expanded the capacity of this system several times. As a result, it has successfully resisted several traffic peaks and ensured the stable operation of the business.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_62":{"id":"6068d68874d8_62","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"2457","text":"Note: In response to Chinaâ€™s â€œclasses have stopped, but learning will continueâ€ proposition from the Ministry of Education of China, and to transform from offline teaching to online teaching in time, the Aixuexi Education Group has launched the â€œLearning on the Cloudâ€ program. The Aixuexi Education Group has opened up high-quality content and provided livestream capabilities to help local K-12 institutions migrate the business to the cloud at the same time. More than 9,000 institutions teach online through the Aixuexi Education Groupâ€™s online platform. The Aixuexi Education Group is helping more institutions smoothly transform and promote the â€œOn-Cloud Learningâ€ program together.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"EM","start":0,"end":5,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null},{"__typename":"Markup","type":"EM","start":29,"end":79,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_63":{"id":"6068d68874d8_63","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"b402","text":"The â€œOn-Cloud Learningâ€ program has been highly recognized in China. At the same time, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group also continues to iterate the system architecture and apply MQTT technology to more two-way communication scenarios between devices and the cloud. By doing so, the Aixuexi Education Group can solve more challenges in the future. mechanism needs to be established. However, the standard HTTP protocol cannot support a service scenario where the server actively sends notifications to the client. Therefore, traditional web architecture cannot meet the requirements of interaction in online classes. There are many solutions to this problem in the industry. The simplest way is the polling solution based on HTTP. Developers only have to make a few modifications to HTTP, so the client can periodically send requests to the server for getting back its notifications, as shown in the following diagram:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_22":{"id":"6068d68874d8_22","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"ff11","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*hPU-MmCQddVjcsHG.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_23":{"id":"6068d68874d8_23","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f99d","text":"This solution, to some degree, can enable the server to actively send notifications to the client. However, it cannot meet requirements for real-time performance, and it generates a large number of empty polling in the case of no notification. There is another solution available besides the polling solution. The HTTP-based long polling solution improved based on general polling. The Long polling solution can avoid empty polling with limited optimization, but it cannot meet the real-time requirements of interaction scenarios.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_24":{"id":"6068d68874d8_24","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"8388","text":"Among all solutions based on the HTTP protocol, the WebSocket-based solution can implement the native two-way communication between the server and the client. By establishing a WebSocket connection, the server can send notifications to the client in real-time. This is also a commonly adopted solution for lightweight Instant Messages (IM) based on web pages. The R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group has also considered using the WebSocket-based solution to implement interaction scenarios in online classes. However, after some research, they found limitations with the solution and decided against it.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_25":{"id":"6068d68874d8_25","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"77c9","text":"In online classes, interaction scenarios have two features:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_26":{"id":"6068d68874d8_26","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"aaa8","text":"1. A single message is often sent to all clients at the same time.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":66,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_27":{"id":"6068d68874d8_27","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"68e5","text":"The sending message scenario mentioned above is a very typical example. Messages sent by one user will be visible to all other users in the same class.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_28":{"id":"6068d68874d8_28","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"0a00","text":"2. The number of online users is large when tens of thousands of classes start simultaneously during peak periods.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":114,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_29":{"id":"6068d68874d8_29","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"37f5","text":"The WebSocket-based solution requires the server to establish connections with each client. If a notification needs to be sent to multiple clients, the sending logic will be implemented on the server.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_30":{"id":"6068d68874d8_30","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"471f","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*IrS-iL98YzUom2yq.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_31":{"id":"6068d68874d8_31","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"744a","text":"When the number of users rises sharply, this architecture will put great pressure on the server, making it difficult to support a large number of online users at the same time. Therefore, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group decided to abandon the WebSocket-based solution and try other ways to support interaction scenarios in online classes.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_32":{"id":"6068d68874d8_32","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"2863","text":"The implementation of the application-layer communication protocol based on TCP or UDP is also a solution that has been studied in depth by the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group. This flexible solution can expand the message transmission through customized protocols. To achieve this, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group has to design an application-layer communication protocol, which is an extremely complex task with various challenges, such as:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_33":{"id":"6068d68874d8_33","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"301e","text":"How do we handle a suspicious connection?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_34":{"id":"6068d68874d8_34","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4888","text":"How do we reconnect a client when they get disconnected?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_35":{"id":"6068d68874d8_35","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"9aa2","text":"How do we resend a message that gets lost during transmission?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_36":{"id":"6068d68874d8_36","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"862e","text":"How do we achieve authentication and permission management?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_37":{"id":"6068d68874d8_37","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"8ded","text":"How do ensure the horizontal scaling of server nodes?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_38":{"id":"6068d68874d8_38","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"25a4","text":"These are all factors the R&D Team should consider. The R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group is capable of handling these details to design a communication protocol suitable for their business scenarios. However, time costs and risks are very high. With the rapid development of business, the R&D Team needs to race against time to find a new solution for interaction scenarios in online classes to support massive amounts of online users.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_39":{"id":"6068d68874d8_39","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"711e","text":"Through the experience accumulated by continuous technology research, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group has reached a conclusion. To meet the needs of interaction in online classes, technical architecture must be able to meet the following requirements:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_40":{"id":"6068d68874d8_40","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"9906","text":"The ability to support massive online clients simultaneously","type":"OLI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_41":{"id":"6068d68874d8_41","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"fdc5","text":"Stability and high availability","type":"OLI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_42":{"id":"6068d68874d8_42","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"bdc6","text":"The server can scale out horizontally if the performance cannot meet requirements","type":"OLI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_43":{"id":"6068d68874d8_43","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"6b60","text":"An intermediate module is used for message distribution to reduce the cost of message replication","type":"OLI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_44":{"id":"6068d68874d8_44","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"df1c","text":"It must be simple and easy to use and can be quickly applied online.","type":"OLI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_45":{"id":"6068d68874d8_45","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"578f","text":"Among them, the best solution to meet the fourth and fifth requirements is implemented based on the Message Queuing Telemetry Transport (MQTT) protocol. The MQTT protocol is a client-server-based messaging and subscription transport protocol that provides reliable network services for devices in low bandwidth and unstable network environments. The MQTT protocol is open, simple, lightweight, and easy to use. It supports one-to-many messaging to decouple applications. It also ensures message reachability, which is very suitable for sending notifications to the mobile client.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"A","start":100,"end":135,"href":"https:\\u002F\\u002Fwww.alibabacloud.com\\u002Fproduct\\u002Fmq","anchorType":"LINK","userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_46":{"id":"6068d68874d8_46","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"d31e","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*1p7vZ-k1_GUKMALv.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_47":{"id":"6068d68874d8_47","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f2ec","text":"However, MQTT is just a protocol. Before applying the MQTT protocol to large-scale commercial scenarios, it needs support from mature and stable products. None of the MQTT solutions from the open-source community have gone through rigorous testing and commercialization. When the number of clients reaches 1,000, their performance sharply declines. Therefore, they cannot support tens of thousands of online clients at the same time.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_48":{"id":"6068d68874d8_48","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"df3c","text":"Focusing on interaction scenarios in online classes, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group has made in-depth exchanges with technical experts from Alibaba Cloud. After several rounds of testing and evaluation, the R&D Team finally decided to use Alibaba Cloudâ€™s micro-Message Queue (mMQ) for MQTT to build its interaction platform for online classes. Compared with open-source solutions, Alibaba Cloudâ€™s mMQ for MQTT has been tested and evolved within Alibaba Group. It supports tens of millions of online connections, millions of concurrent messages, and notification sending at the millisecond level. It is designed with a distributed architecture. With no Single Point of Failure (SPOF) and infinite horizontal scalability between components, it ensures the elastic scalability of capacity and transparency to users.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"A","start":390,"end":418,"href":"https:\\u002F\\u002Fwww.alibabacloud.com\\u002Fproduct\\u002Fmq","anchorType":"LINK","userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_49":{"id":"6068d68874d8_49","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"dec1","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*-77nONjxY7HCbU6O.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_50":{"id":"6068d68874d8_50","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f25f","text":"In this architecture, clients on the Internet access Alibaba Cloudâ€™s mMQ for MQTT through the standard MQTT protocol. The SDK of the MQTT protocol covers almost all mainstream development languages and can be adapted to the unstable network of the mobile client. Server cluster on the cloud accesses Message Queue (MQ) for RocketMQ through the RocketMQ protocol and realizes two-way interconnections between servers and clients through protocol conversion between RocketMQ and MQTT.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"A","start":53,"end":81,"href":"https:\\u002F\\u002Fwww.alibabacloud.com\\u002Fproduct\\u002Fmq","anchorType":"LINK","userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_51":{"id":"6068d68874d8_51","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4665","text":"Why was a new component, MQ for RocketMQ, introduced? Why are server instances accessed to MQ for RocketMQ through RocketMQ protocol? There are three main reasons:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_52":{"id":"6068d68874d8_52","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"2adc","text":"1. Compared with client instances, server instances are smaller in scale, while the message throughput of a single server instance is larger than that of the client.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":165,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_53":{"id":"6068d68874d8_53","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"86b1","text":"In a typical online class scenario, tens of thousands (or hundreds of thousands) of clients are connected to the server at the same time. Each client should send and receive no more than ten messages per second. However, each server instance may process tens of thousands of messages per second in a cluster with 100 instances. The difference between the server and the client determines that they need to use different communication protocols for access to maximize their performance and efficiency.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_54":{"id":"6068d68874d8_54","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"364a","text":"2. When the processing capability of the server is insufficient, messages need to be temporarily stored in the queue.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":117,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_55":{"id":"6068d68874d8_55","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f652","text":"The introduction of RocketMQ provides message storage for MQTT.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_56":{"id":"6068d68874d8_56","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"5a7c","text":"3. Multiple instances of the server cluster imply peer-to-peer and task-allocation relationships. The RocketMQ-based cluster consumption mode can provide the native load balancing mechanism.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":190,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_57":{"id":"6068d68874d8_57","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4ae7","text":"Letâ€™s come back to the message sending scenario in online classes. After the message is submitted, an instance in the server cluster receives the message through the load balancing mechanism. After reviewing, the message can be distributed to other users in the same class by delivering it to the MQTT-based cloud service. Thus, for server instances, they only need to establish connections with the MQTT-based cloud service for serving tens of thousands of users at the same time.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_58":{"id":"6068d68874d8_58","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"718f","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*1iSQeYZdSkzMiQj9.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_59":{"id":"6068d68874d8_59","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4dd4","text":"When the server instance encounters a performance bottleneck during peak hours, this issue can be solved by adding more server instances. For MQTT-based cloud services, the performance improvement of it can be achieved by upgrading configurations according to rules, which has little influence on the operation of the application.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_60":{"id":"6068d68874d8_60","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"b07a","text":"Based on this architecture, the R&D Team of the Aixuexi Education Group built a complete class interaction system in half a month. The R&D Team does not need to focus on complex technical issues at the application layer, such as bad network environments, reconnection, exception handling, high concurrency, and high system availability. This architecture helps the team greatly reduce development costs and improve user experience.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_61":{"id":"6068d68874d8_61","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4b66","text":"To support the rapid increase of users brought by the â€œOn-Cloud Learningâ€ program, Aixuexi Education Group has expanded the capacity of this system several times. The Aixuexi Education Group has opened up high-quality content and provided livestream capabilities to help local K-12 institutions migrate the business to the cloud at the same time. More than 9,000 institutions teach online through the Aixuexi Education Groupâ€™s online platform. The Aixuexi Education Group is helping more institutions smoothly transform and promote the â€œOn-Cloud Learningâ€ program together.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"EM","start":0,"end":5,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null},{"__typename":"Markup","type":"EM","start":29,"end":79,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_63":{"id":"6068d68874d8_63","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"b402","text":"The â€œOn-Cloud Learningâ€ program has been highly recognized in China. However, the standard HTTP protocol cannot support a service scenario where the server actively sends notifications to the client. Therefore, traditional web architecture cannot meet the requirements of interaction in online classes. There are many solutions to this problem in the industry. The simplest way is the polling solution based on HTTP. Developers only have to make a few modifications to HTTP, so the client can periodically send requests to the server for getting back its notifications, as shown in the following diagram:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_22":{"id":"6068d68874d8_22","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"ff11","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*hPU-MmCQddVjcsHG.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_23":{"id":"6068d68874d8_23","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f99d","text":"This solution, to some degree, can enable the server to actively send notifications to the client. However, it cannot meet requirements for real-time performance, and it generates a large number of empty polling in the case of no notification. There is another solution available besides the polling solution. The HTTP-based long polling solution improved based on general polling. The Long polling solution can avoid empty polling with limited optimization, but it cannot meet the real-time requirements of interaction scenarios.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_24":{"id":"6068d68874d8_24","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"8388","text":"Among all solutions based on the HTTP protocol, the WebSocket-based solution can implement the native two-way communication between the server and the client. By establishing a WebSocket connection, the server can send notifications to the client in real-time. This is also a commonly adopted solution for lightweight Instant Messages (IM) based on web pages. The R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group has also considered using the WebSocket-based solution to implement interaction scenarios in online classes. However, after some research, they found limitations with the solution and decided against it.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_25":{"id":"6068d68874d8_25","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"77c9","text":"In online classes, interaction scenarios have two features:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_26":{"id":"6068d68874d8_26","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"aaa8","text":"1. A single message is often sent to all clients at the same time.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":66,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_27":{"id":"6068d68874d8_27","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"68e5","text":"The sending message scenario mentioned above is a very typical example. Messages sent by one user will be visible to all other users in the same class.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_28":{"id":"6068d68874d8_28","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"0a00","text":"2. The number of online users is large when tens of thousands of classes start simultaneously during peak periods.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":114,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_29":{"id":"6068d68874d8_29","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"37f5","text":"The WebSocket-based solution requires the server to establish connections with each client. If a notification needs to be sent to multiple clients, the sending logic will be implemented on the server.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_30":{"id":"6068d68874d8_30","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"471f","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*IrS-iL98YzUom2yq.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_31":{"id":"6068d68874d8_31","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"744a","text":"When the number of users rises sharply, this architecture will put great pressure on the server, making it difficult to support a large number of online users at the same time. Therefore, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group decided to abandon the WebSocket-based solution and try other ways to support interaction scenarios in online classes.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_32":{"id":"6068d68874d8_32","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"2863","text":"The implementation of the application-layer communication protocol based on TCP or UDP is also a solution that has been studied in depth by the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group. This flexible solution can expand the message transmission through customized protocols. To achieve this, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group has to design an application-layer communication protocol, which is an extremely complex task with various challenges, such as:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_33":{"id":"6068d68874d8_33","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"301e","text":"How do we handle a suspicious connection?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_34":{"id":"6068d68874d8_34","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4888","text":"How do we reconnect a client when they get disconnected?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_35":{"id":"6068d68874d8_35","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"9aa2","text":"How do we resend a message that gets lost during transmission?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_36":{"id":"6068d68874d8_36","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"862e","text":"How do we achieve authentication and permission management?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_37":{"id":"6068d68874d8_37","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"8ded","text":"How do ensure the horizontal scaling of server nodes?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_38":{"id":"6068d68874d8_38","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"25a4","text":"These are all factors the R&D Team should consider. The R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group is capable of handling these details to design a communication protocol suitable for their business scenarios. However, time costs and risks are very high. With the rapid development of business, the R&D Team needs to race against time to find a new solution for interaction scenarios in online classes to support massive amounts of online users.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_39":{"id":"6068d68874d8_39","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"711e","text":"Through the experience accumulated by continuous technology research, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group has reached a conclusion. ability to support massive online clients replication","type":"OLI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_44":{"id":"6068d68874d8_44","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"df1c","text":"It must be simple and easy to use and can be quickly applied online.","type":"OLI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_45":{"id":"6068d68874d8_45","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"578f","text":"Among them, the best solution to meet the fourth and fifth requirements is implemented based on the Message Queuing Telemetry Transport (MQTT) protocol. The MQTT protocol is a client-server-based messaging and subscription transport protocol that provides reliable network services for devices in low bandwidth and unstable network environments. The MQTT protocol is open, simple, lightweight, and easy to use. It supports one-to-many messaging to decouple applications. It also ensures message reachability, which is very suitable for sending notifications to the mobile client.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"A","start":100,"end":135,"href":"https:\\u002F\\u002Fwww.alibabacloud.com\\u002Fproduct\\u002Fmq","anchorType":"LINK","userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_46":{"id":"6068d68874d8_46","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"d31e","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*1p7vZ-k1_GUKMALv.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_47":{"id":"6068d68874d8_47","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f2ec","text":"However, MQTT is just a protocol. Before applying the MQTT protocol to large-scale commercial scenarios, it needs support from mature and stable products. None of the MQTT solutions from the open-source community have gone through rigorous testing and commercialization. When the number of clients reaches 1,000, their performance sharply declines. Therefore, they cannot support tens of thousands of online clients at the same time.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_48":{"id":"6068d68874d8_48","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"df3c","text":"Focusing on interaction scenarios in online classes, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group has made in-depth exchanges with technical experts from Alibaba Cloud. After several rounds of testing and evaluation, the R&D Team finally decided to use Alibaba Cloudâ€™s micro-Message Queue (mMQ) for MQTT to build its interaction platform for online classes. Compared with open-source solutions, Alibaba Cloudâ€™s mMQ for MQTT has been tested and evolved within Alibaba Group. It supports tens of millions of online connections, millions of concurrent messages, and notification sending at the millisecond level. It is designed with a distributed architecture. With no Single Point of Failure (SPOF) and infinite horizontal scalability between components, it ensures the elastic scalability of capacity and transparency to users.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"A","start":390,"end":418,"href":"https:\\u002F\\u002Fwww.alibabacloud.com\\u002Fproduct\\u002Fmq","anchorType":"LINK","userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_49":{"id":"6068d68874d8_49","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"dec1","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*-77nONjxY7HCbU6O.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_50":{"id":"6068d68874d8_50","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f25f","text":"In this architecture, clients on the Internet access Alibaba Cloudâ€™s mMQ for MQTT through the standard MQTT protocol. The SDK of the MQTT protocol covers almost all mainstream development languages and can be adapted to the unstable network of the mobile client. Server cluster on the cloud accesses Message Queue (MQ) for RocketMQ through the RocketMQ protocol and realizes two-way interconnections between servers and clients through protocol conversion between RocketMQ and MQTT.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"A","start":53,"end":81,"href":"https:\\u002F\\u002Fwww.alibabacloud.com\\u002Fproduct\\u002Fmq","anchorType":"LINK","userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_51":{"id":"6068d68874d8_51","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4665","text":"Why was a new component, MQ for RocketMQ, introduced? Why are server instances accessed to MQ for RocketMQ through RocketMQ protocol? There are three main reasons:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_52":{"id":"6068d68874d8_52","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"2adc","text":"1. Compared with client instances, server instances are smaller in scale, while the message throughput of a single server instance is larger than that of the client.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":165,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_53":{"id":"6068d68874d8_53","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"86b1","text":"In a typical online class scenario, tens of thousands (or hundreds of thousands) of clients are connected to the server at the same time. Each client should send and receive no more than ten messages per second. However, each server instance may process tens of thousands of messages per second in a cluster with 100 instances. The difference between the server and the client determines that they need to use different communication protocols for access to maximize their performance and efficiency.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_54":{"id":"6068d68874d8_54","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"364a","text":"2. When the processing capability of the server is insufficient, messages need to be temporarily stored in the queue.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":117,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_55":{"id":"6068d68874d8_55","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f652","text":"The introduction of RocketMQ provides message storage for MQTT.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_56":{"id":"6068d68874d8_56","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"5a7c","text":"3. Multiple instances of the server cluster imply peer-to-peer and task-allocation relationships. The RocketMQ-based cluster consumption mode can provide the native load balancing mechanism.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":190,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_57":{"id":"6068d68874d8_57","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4ae7","text":"Letâ€™s come back to the message sending scenario in online classes. After the message is submitted, an instance in the server cluster receives the message through the load balancing mechanism. After reviewing, the message can be distributed to other users in the same class by delivering it to the MQTT-based cloud service. Thus, for server instances, they only need to establish connections with the MQTT-based cloud service for serving tens of thousands of users at the same time.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_58":{"id":"6068d68874d8_58","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"718f","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*1iSQeYZdSkzMiQj9.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_59":{"id":"6068d68874d8_59","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4dd4","text":"When the server instance encounters a performance bottleneck during peak hours, this issue can be solved by adding more server instances. For MQTT-based cloud services, the performance improvement of it can be achieved by upgrading configurations according to rules, which has little influence on the operation of the application.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_60":{"id":"6068d68874d8_60","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"b07a","text":"Based on this architecture, the R&D Team of the Aixuexi Education Group built a complete class interaction system in half a month. The R&D Team does not need to focus on complex technical issues at the application layer, such as bad network environments, reconnection, exception handling, high concurrency, and high system availability. This architecture helps the team greatly reduce development costs and improve user experience.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_61":{"id":"6068d68874d8_61","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4b66","text":"To support the rapid increase of users brought by the â€œOn-Cloud Learningâ€ program, Aixuexi Education Group has expanded the capacity of this system several times. As a result, it has successfully resisted several traffic peaks and ensured the stable operation of the business.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_62":{"id":"6068d68874d8_62","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"2457","text":"Note: In response to Chinaâ€™s â€œclasses have stopped, but learning will continueâ€ proposition from the Ministry of Education of China, and to transform from offline teaching to online teaching in time, the Aixuexi Education Group has launched the â€œLearning on the Cloudâ€ program. The Aixuexi Education Group has opened up high-quality content and provided livestream capabilities to help local K-12 institutions migrate the business to the cloud at the same time. More than 9,000 institutions teach online through the Aixuexi Education Groupâ€™s online platform. The Aixuexi Education Group is helping more institutions smoothly transform and promote the â€œOn-Cloud Learningâ€ program together.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"EM","start":0,"end":5,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null},{"__typename":"Markup","type":"EM","start":29,"end":79,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_63":{"id":"6068d68874d8_63","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"b402","text":"The â€œOn-Cloud Learningâ€ program has been highly recognized in China. At the same time, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group also continues to iterate the system architecture and apply MQTT technology to more two-way communication scenarios between devices and the cloud. By doing so, the Aixuexi Education Group can solve more challenges in the future. However, the standard HTTP protocol cannot support a service scenario where the server actively sends notifications to the client. Therefore, traditional web architecture cannot meet the requirements of interaction in online classes. There are many solutions to this problem in the industry. The simplest way is the polling solution based on HTTP. Developers only have to make a few modifications to HTTP, so the client can periodically send requests to the server for getting back its notifications, as shown in the following diagram:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_22":{"id":"6068d68874d8_22","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"ff11","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*hPU-MmCQddVjcsHG.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_23":{"id":"6068d68874d8_23","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f99d","text":"This solution, to some degree, can enable the server to actively send notifications to the client. However, it cannot meet requirements for real-time performance, and it generates a large number of empty polling in the case of no notification. There is another solution available besides the polling solution. The HTTP-based long polling solution improved based on general polling. The Long polling solution can avoid empty polling with limited optimization, but it cannot meet the real-time requirements of interaction scenarios.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_24":{"id":"6068d68874d8_24","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"8388","text":"Among all solutions based on the HTTP protocol, the WebSocket-based solution can implement the native two-way communication between the server and the client. By establishing a WebSocket connection, the server can send notifications to the client in real-time. This is also a commonly adopted solution for lightweight Instant Messages (IM) based on web pages. The R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group has also considered using the WebSocket-based solution to implement interaction scenarios in online classes. However, after some research, they found limitations with the solution and decided against it.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_25":{"id":"6068d68874d8_25","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"77c9","text":"In online classes, interaction scenarios have two features:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_26":{"id":"6068d68874d8_26","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"aaa8","text":"1. A single message is often sent to all clients at the same time.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":66,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_27":{"id":"6068d68874d8_27","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"68e5","text":"The sending message scenario mentioned above is a very typical example. Messages sent by one user will be visible to all other users in the same class.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_28":{"id":"6068d68874d8_28","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"0a00","text":"2. The number of online users is large when tens of thousands of classes start simultaneously during peak periods.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":114,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_29":{"id":"6068d68874d8_29","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"37f5","text":"The WebSocket-based solution requires the server to establish connections with each client. If a notification needs to be sent to multiple clients, the sending logic will be implemented on the server.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_30":{"id":"6068d68874d8_30","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"471f","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*IrS-iL98YzUom2yq.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_31":{"id":"6068d68874d8_31","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"744a","text":"When the number of users rises sharply, this architecture will put great pressure on the server, making it difficult to support a large number of online users at the same time. Therefore, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group decided to abandon the WebSocket-based solution and try other ways to support interaction scenarios in online classes.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_32":{"id":"6068d68874d8_32","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"2863","text":"The implementation of the application-layer communication protocol based on TCP or UDP is also a solution that has been studied in depth by the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group. This flexible solution can expand the message transmission through customized protocols. To achieve this, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group has to design an application-layer communication protocol, which is an extremely complex task with various challenges, such as:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_33":{"id":"6068d68874d8_33","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"301e","text":"How do we handle a suspicious connection?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_34":{"id":"6068d68874d8_34","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4888","text":"How do we reconnect a client when they get disconnected?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_35":{"id":"6068d68874d8_35","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"9aa2","text":"How do we resend a message that gets lost during transmission?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_36":{"id":"6068d68874d8_36","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"862e","text":"How do we achieve authentication and permission management?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_37":{"id":"6068d68874d8_37","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"8ded","text":"How do ensure the horizontal scaling of server nodes?","type":"ULI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_38":{"id":"6068d68874d8_38","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"25a4","text":"These are all factors the R&D Team should consider. The R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group is capable of handling these details to design a communication protocol suitable for their business scenarios. However, time costs and risks are very high. With the rapid development of business, the R&D Team needs to race against time to find a new solution for interaction scenarios in online classes to support massive amounts of online users.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_39":{"id":"6068d68874d8_39","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"711e","text":"Through the experience accumulated by continuous technology research, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group has reached a conclusion. To meet the needs of interaction in online classes, technical architecture must be able to meet the following requirements:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_40":{"id":"6068d68874d8_40","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"9906","text":"The ability to support massive online clients simultaneously","type":"OLI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_41":{"id":"6068d68874d8_41","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"fdc5","text":"Stability and high availability","type":"OLI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_42":{"id":"6068d68874d8_42","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"bdc6","text":"The server can scale out horizontally if the performance cannot meet requirements","type":"OLI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_43":{"id":"6068d68874d8_43","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"6b60","text":"An intermediate module is used for message distribution to reduce the cost of message replication","type":"OLI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_44":{"id":"6068d68874d8_44","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"df1c","text":"It must be simple and easy to use and can be quickly applied online.","type":"OLI","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_45":{"id":"6068d68874d8_45","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"578f","text":"Among them, the best solution to meet the fourth and fifth requirements is implemented based on the Message Queuing Telemetry Transport (MQTT) protocol. The MQTT protocol is a client-server-based messaging and subscription transport protocol that provides reliable network services for devices in low bandwidth and unstable network environments. The MQTT protocol is open, simple, lightweight, and easy to use. It supports one-to-many messaging to decouple applications. It also ensures message reachability, which is very suitable for sending notifications to the mobile client.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"A","start":100,"end":135,"href":"https:\\u002F\\u002Fwww.alibabacloud.com\\u002Fproduct\\u002Fmq","anchorType":"LINK","userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_46":{"id":"6068d68874d8_46","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"d31e","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*1p7vZ-k1_GUKMALv.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_47":{"id":"6068d68874d8_47","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f2ec","text":"However, MQTT is just a protocol. Before applying the MQTT protocol to large-scale commercial scenarios, it needs support from mature and stable products. None of the MQTT solutions from the open-source community have gone through rigorous testing and commercialization. When the number of clients reaches 1,000, their performance sharply declines. Therefore, they cannot support tens of thousands of online clients at the same time.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_48":{"id":"6068d68874d8_48","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"df3c","text":"Focusing on interaction scenarios in online classes, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group has made in-depth exchanges with technical experts from Alibaba Cloud. After several rounds of testing and evaluation, the R&D Team finally decided to use Alibaba Cloudâ€™s micro-Message Queue (mMQ) for MQTT to build its interaction platform for online classes. Compared with open-source solutions, Alibaba Cloudâ€™s mMQ for MQTT has been tested and evolved within Alibaba Group. It supports tens of millions of online connections, millions of concurrent messages, and notification sending at the millisecond level. It is designed with a distributed architecture. With no Single Point of Failure (SPOF) and infinite horizontal scalability between components, it ensures the elastic scalability of capacity and transparency to users.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"A","start":390,"end":418,"href":"https:\\u002F\\u002Fwww.alibabacloud.com\\u002Fproduct\\u002Fmq","anchorType":"LINK","userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_49":{"id":"6068d68874d8_49","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"dec1","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*-77nONjxY7HCbU6O.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_50":{"id":"6068d68874d8_50","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f25f","text":"In this architecture, clients on the Internet access Alibaba Cloudâ€™s mMQ for MQTT through the standard MQTT protocol. The SDK of the MQTT protocol covers almost all mainstream development languages and can be adapted to the unstable network of the mobile client. Server cluster on the cloud accesses Message Queue (MQ) for RocketMQ through the RocketMQ protocol and realizes two-way interconnections between servers and clients through protocol conversion between RocketMQ and MQTT.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"A","start":53,"end":81,"href":"https:\\u002F\\u002Fwww.alibabacloud.com\\u002Fproduct\\u002Fmq","anchorType":"LINK","userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_51":{"id":"6068d68874d8_51","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4665","text":"Why was a new component, MQ for RocketMQ, introduced? Why are server instances accessed to MQ for RocketMQ through RocketMQ protocol? There are three main reasons:","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_52":{"id":"6068d68874d8_52","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"2adc","text":"1. Compared with client instances, server instances are smaller in scale, while the message throughput of a single server instance is larger than that of the client.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":165,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_53":{"id":"6068d68874d8_53","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"86b1","text":"In a typical online class scenario, tens of thousands (or hundreds of thousands) of clients are connected to the server at the same time. Each client should send and receive no more than ten messages per second. However, each server instance may process tens of thousands of messages per second in a cluster with 100 instances. The difference between the server and the client determines that they need to use different communication protocols for access to maximize their performance and efficiency.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_54":{"id":"6068d68874d8_54","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"364a","text":"2. When the processing capability of the server is insufficient, messages need to be temporarily stored in the queue.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":117,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_55":{"id":"6068d68874d8_55","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"f652","text":"The introduction of RocketMQ provides message storage for MQTT.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_56":{"id":"6068d68874d8_56","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"5a7c","text":"3. Multiple instances of the server cluster imply peer-to-peer and task-allocation relationships. The RocketMQ-based cluster consumption mode can provide the native load balancing mechanism.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"STRONG","start":0,"end":190,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_57":{"id":"6068d68874d8_57","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4ae7","text":"Letâ€™s come back to the message sending scenario in online classes. After the message is submitted, an instance in the server cluster receives the message through the load balancing mechanism. After reviewing, the message can be distributed to other users in the same class by delivering it to the MQTT-based cloud service. Thus, for server instances, they only need to establish connections with the MQTT-based cloud service for serving tens of thousands of users at the same time.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_58":{"id":"6068d68874d8_58","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"718f","text":"","type":"IMG","href":null,"layout":"INSET_CENTER","metadata":{"__ref":"ImageMetadata:0*1iSQeYZdSkzMiQj9.png"},"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_59":{"id":"6068d68874d8_59","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4dd4","text":"When the server instance encounters a performance bottleneck during peak hours, this issue can be solved by adding more server instances. For MQTT-based cloud services, the performance improvement of it can be achieved by upgrading configurations according to rules, which has little influence on the operation of the application.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_60":{"id":"6068d68874d8_60","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"b07a","text":"Based on this architecture, the R&D Team of the Aixuexi Education Group built a complete class interaction system in half a month. The R&D Team does not need to focus on complex technical issues at the application layer, such as bad network environments, reconnection, exception handling, high concurrency, and high system availability. This architecture helps the team greatly reduce development costs and improve user experience.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_61":{"id":"6068d68874d8_61","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"4b66","text":"To support the rapid increase of users brought by the â€œOn-Cloud Learningâ€ program, Aixuexi Education Group has expanded the capacity of this system several times. As a result, it has successfully resisted several traffic peaks and ensured the stable operation of the business.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_62":{"id":"6068d68874d8_62","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"2457","text":"Note: In response to Chinaâ€™s â€œclasses have stopped, but learning will continueâ€ proposition from the Ministry of Education of China, and to transform from offline teaching to online teaching in time, the Aixuexi Education Group has launched the â€œLearning on the Cloudâ€ program. The Aixuexi Education Group has opened up high-quality content and provided livestream capabilities to help local K-12 institutions migrate the business to the cloud at the same time. More than 9,000 institutions teach online through the Aixuexi Education Groupâ€™s online platform. The Aixuexi Education Group is helping more institutions smoothly transform and promote the â€œOn-Cloud Learningâ€ program together.","type":"P","href":null,"layout":null,"metadata":null,"hasDropCap":null,"iframe":null,"mixtapeMetadata":null,"dropCapImage":null,"markups":[{"__typename":"Markup","type":"EM","start":0,"end":5,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null},{"__typename":"Markup","type":"EM","start":29,"end":79,"href":null,"anchorType":null,"userId":null,"linkMetadata":null}]},"Paragraph:6068d68874d8_63":{"id":"6068d68874d8_63","__typename":"Paragraph","name":"b402","text":"The â€œOn-Cloud Learningâ€ program has been highly recognized in China. At the same time, the R&D Team of Aixuexi Education Group also continues to iterate the system architecture and apply MQTT technology to more two-way communication scenarios between devices and the cloud. By doing so, the Aixuexi Education Group can solve more challenges in the future.
